name: AYUSH SHARMA

projects.name: UI Clone Projects
projects.description: Successfully developed user interface (UI) clones of prominent websites for "Two Good Co and "Duo- Studio Co.", showcasing expertise in front-end development, design aesthetics, and attention to detail. Demonstrated proficiency in replicating original website functionality and aesthetics while ensuring adherence to client requirements.

projects.name: React Task Manager App
projects.description: Created a streamlined Task Manager application using React.js, enabling users to efficiently manage tasks with features like task creation, deletion, and updating. Implemented state management and component lifecycle methods for seamless task management, ensuring a smooth user experience.

projects.name: Full Stack Blog App
projects.description: Created a blog app using React and Appwrite, facilitating seamless post management. Integrated Appwrite for secure authentication and efficient data handling.

experiences.description: Orchestrated digital strategy and content creation, amplifying club visibility and engagement across platforms.
Designed intuitive interfaces and developed front-end solutions to enhance user experience and engagement.
